taxon.author: (Hahn, 1833)
taxon.distribution: Europe, Turkey, North Africa, Syria, Iran, Turkmenistan. Introduced to North America

referenceObject.reference: Hahn, C. W. (1833a). Die Arachniden. C. H. Zeh'sche Buchhandlung, Nürnberg, Erster Band, pp. 77-129, pl. 19-36 (f. 57-95); Zweiter Band, pp. 1-16, pl. 37-47 (f. 96-105).
